item.description: Get Satisfaction- its what you want when you ring a call centre - like your bank, your tax office or some other service provider. Get Satisfaction, if you don’t know it is the name of a powerful web based customer service tool which helps customers to connect and help themselves. I’ve just launched a Get Satisfaction forum to demonstrate the features of their free service - and it works well.
